getData<-function(tickers,datasrc){
  for (i in 1:length(tickers)){
    cat(tickers[i],i,"\n")
    getSymbols(tickers[i],src=datasrc,
               auto.assign=getOption("getSymbols.auto.assign",TRUE),
               env=parent.frame())
  }
}
